sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>sweet</radical> <radical>woman</radical> sits under a <radical>tree</radical> and works as a <kanji>mediator</kanji>. If you're having a fight with someone, bring them to the sweet woman under the tree and she'll mediate for the two of you. Problem solved! Thanks sweet lady!
meaningInfo: Imagine the sweet tree woman being a mediator for you and your arch rival. What she says fixes everything between you two!
readingMnemonic: You go to pay the woman for being your <kanji>mediator</kanji> for you two but she just says, "<reading>Bye</reading> <ja>ばい</ja>)." You try to hand her some money and she stares into your eyes. "Bye." Oh... okay, bye then.
readingInfo: Imagine her refusing to let you pay her for her mediator services and just saying "bye" over and over until you leave. Weird.
